channel.title: Stairs
channel.description:
Wow, I feel like an idiot... I stopped coding and forgot basically everything... Okay, don't laugh.
Can someone help me along on how to make stairs work...

item.title: Stairs
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Get its object id and make it into a case. Use this as an example:

case ####: // replace #s with stair's obj id. teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; // Change the height level to the height you want the stairs to take you to. break;

Read full topic
